Sentencas: The emergence of fuel-cell systems and hybrid fuel-cell systems requires the evolution of analysis strategies for evaluating thermodynamic performance.
Titulo: Probabilistic analysis of a solid-oxide fuel-cell based hybrid gas-turbine system

Sentencas: A gas-turbine thermodynamic cycle integrated with a fuel cell was computationally simulated and probabilistically evaluated in view of the several uncertainties in the thermodynamic performance parameters.
Titulo: Probabilistic analysis of a solid-oxide fuel-cell based hybrid gas-turbine system

Sentencas: Cumulative distribution functions and sensitivity factors were computed for the overall thermal-efficiency due to the uncertainties in the thermodynamic random variables.
Titulo: Probabilistic analysis of a solid-oxide fuel-cell based hybrid gas-turbine system

Sentencas: These results can be used to quickly identify the most critical design variables in order to optimize the design and make it cost effective.
Titulo: Probabilistic analysis of a solid-oxide fuel-cell based hybrid gas-turbine system

Sentencas: The analysis leads to the selection of criteria for gas-turbine performance.
Titulo: Probabilistic analysis of a solid-oxide fuel-cell based hybrid gas-turbine system
